name: Seize the Cheese
description:
An adventure puzzle, wait and see  Narrated by a spider named Bitsy

We are a post-grad team from George Brown Presenting a game about a lost little mouse

Follow his journey through the old cottage home Where Smudge the Cat and dust bunnies roam

Sit down, play our game, and rewind Feel like you’ve never left your childhood behind

Playtest Information: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xZoxwzCfjHUcATQr8RA6hhvJYIkZzvgCzSCbPlAbI8A/...

Playtest Survey: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/15EFFb-BKkXKFFNAKXnOFHwxyjOsnZvb_z8mrQYrDHhg/vie...
